data.enText: the quality of being useful, easy or suitable for sb

data.chText: 为方便顾客我们备有座位。
data.enText: We have provided seats for the convenience of our customers.

data.chText: 为方便起见，这两个组在本报告中被视为一组。
data.enText: For (the sake of) convenience , the two groups have been treated as one in this report.

data.chText: 在这个度假胜地你可享受所有现代旅游的舒适与便利。
data.enText: In this resort you can enjoy all the comfort and convenience of modern tourism.

data.chText: 便利的事物（或设施）；方便的用具
data.enText: something that is useful and can make things easier or quicker to do, or more comfortable

data.chText: 学校这么近真是太方便了。
data.enText: It was a great convenience to have the school so near.

data.chText: 这座房子拥有在当时并不常见的所有现代化便利设施。
data.enText: The house had all the modern conveniences (= central heating, etc.) that were unusual at that time.

data.chText: 在方便时；在适宜的地点
data.enText: at a time or a place which is suitable for sb

data.chText: 你能不能在你方便时给我来个电话，安排见一次面？
data.enText: Can you telephone me at your convenience to arrange a meeting?
Please telephone at your earliest convenience.

simple_means.memory_skill: con 共同 + ven 来 + ience 表状态 → 全部能来没有障碍 → 方便

data.chText: 在方便时；在适宜的地点
data.enText: at a time or a place which is suitable for sb

data.chText: 你能不能在你方便时给我来个电话，安排见一次面？
data.enText: Can you telephone me at your convenience to arrange a meeting?
Please telephone at your earliest convenience.

tr: a device or control that is very useful for a particular job
a toilet that is available to the public
the quality of being useful and convenient
example: they offered the convenience of an installment plan

tr: the state of being suitable or opportune
example: chairs arranged for his own convenience

value.def: If something is done for your convenience, it is done in a way that is useful or suitable for you.

example.ex: He was happy to make a detour for her convenience.
example.tran: 为了她方便，他很乐意绕道。

example.ex: ...the need to put the rights of citizens above the convenience of elected officials.
example.tran: 需要把公民的权利置于当选官员的便利之上

defx.def: If something is arranged to happen at your convenience, it happens at a time which is most suitable for you.
defx.tran: 就…的方便;在…方便的时候

example.ex: Delivery times are arranged at your convenience.
example.tran: 送货时间会安排在您方便的时候。

value.def: If you describe something as a convenience, you mean that it is very useful.

example.ex: Mail order is a convenience for buyers who are too busy to shop.
example.tran: 邮购对于那些没有时间逛商店的购物者来说是一项非常方便的服务。

value.def: Conveniences are pieces of equipment designed to make your life easier.

example.ex: Some TVRs have power steering and conveniences such as central locking and powered windows.
example.tran: 一些特雷沃车型配有动力转向系统以及中央锁和电动窗之类的便利装置。

example.ex: ...an apartment with all the modern conveniences.
example.tran: 现代化便利设施一应俱全的公寓

value.def: A public convenience is a building containing toilets which is provided in a public place for anyone to use.

trans: 方便旗(指船由于法律或经济上的原因挂外国国旗)
(出于实际需要、金钱或政治原因的)权宜婚姻

partsOfSpeech.dec: ad 加强 + vent 来 → 来到
advent 到来 + itious …的 →〔突然〕来到的 → 偶然的
ad 加强 + venture 冒险；冒险行动 → 冒险
adventur〔e〕冒险 + ous 有…性质的，关于…的 → 爱冒险的
a 加强 + ven 来 + ue → 让人们可以走来走去 → 大路
contra 反对；相反；对比 + ven 来 + e → 反着来 → 违反
con 共同 + ven 来 + e → 都来到一起 → 召集
con 共同 + ven 来 + ience 表状态 → 全部能来没有障碍 → 方便
con 共同 + vent 来 + ion 表名词 → 大家来到一起 → 集会
e 出 + vent 来 → 出来的事 → 事件
event 事件 + ful …的 → 事件多的 → 多变故的
partsOfSpeech.d: 发生许多事情的；多变故的

partsOfSpeech.dec: event 事件 + ual 有…性质的 → 出事〔之后〕→ 最终的
inter 在…之间 + ven 来 + e → 走到中间来 → 干涉
in 使… + vent 来 → 使…出来 → 发明出
in 进入 + vent 来 + ory 表物 → 进来的〔全部财产〕→ 财产清单
pre 预先 + vent 来 → 预先来到 → 抢先一步，防止别人先到 → 防止
re 回 + ven 来 + ue → 回来的东西 → 收入
ven 来 + ture 行为，行为的结果，与行为有关之物 →〔危险〕来到 → 冒险
